title: 2009년 Graham 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Graham. 판결일: 2009-04-30. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: LeRoyal GRAHAM v. Greenry A. NEAL, Powhatan County Sheriff Helen F. Fahey, VA Parole Board (Chair) Gene Johnson, Director Department of Correction
**판결일**: 2009-04-30
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Duncan, Gregory, Michael

## 변호인

LeRoyal Graham, Appellant Pro Se.

## 인용

- 324 F. App'x 266

## 판결문 요약


Affirmed by unpublished PER CURIAM opinion.
Unpublished opinions are not binding precedent in this circuit.
PER CURIAM:
LeRoyal Graham appeals the district court’s order dismissing his 42 U.S.C. § 1983 (2006) complaint under 28 U.S.C. § 1915A(b) (2006). We have reviewed the record and find no reversible error. Accordingly, we affirm for the reasons stated by the district court. Graham v. Fahey, No. 2:08-CV-00289-JB F-JEB (E.D.Va. Aug. 12, 2008). We dispense with oral argument because the facts and legal contentions are adequately presented in the materials before the court and argument would not aid the decisional process.

AFFIRMED.
